_header: Of my lady well me rejoice I may
_description: Thomas Hoccleve, Humourous Praise of his Lady — a roundel, twenty-four lines

HunHM744.First Lines:
Of my lady wel me reioise I mayhir golden forheed is ful narw &
                    smal…
HunHM744.Last Lines:
…Hir comly body shape as a foot balAnd shee syngith ful lyk a
                    papenJay
HunHM744.Attributed Title:
Cest tout (f. 52); Cy ensuent trois chaunceons lune conpleynante
                        a la dame monoie et lautre La response dele a cellui qui se conpleynt &
                        la tierce la commendacion de ma dame (f. 51v)
